Trigger.name: Guild Door Knocking (33%)

regexCodeList.string: Type KNOCK DOOR on the door nearby. See what reception lies in store for you...

Trigger.name: Novice Chapter Progression #1
Trigger.script:
capture = matches[2] if string.find(capture, "<") then cecho("\n<cyan>***PROMPT USER INPUT***")
else tempTimer(3, [[send(capture)]]) end

regexCodeList.string: Use (.*) to progress your current chapter.
Ready to tackle an experience\? Type DO \<experience name\> to begin in earnest e\.g\. (.*)\.
This chapter needs you to have: (Experience Name)

Trigger.name: score #1
Trigger.script: captured() --Line 1 character.name = matches[2] character.rank = matches[3] character.level = matches[4]

regexCodeList.string: (\D+)\, the commoner \"(\D+)\" \[Level: (\D+)\]\.

Trigger.name: score #2
Trigger.script: captured() --Line 2 character.levelPercent = tonumber(matches[2]) character.level = matches[3] character.levelNext = matches[4]

regexCodeList.string: You are (\d+)\% between (\D+) and (\D+)\.

Trigger.name: score #3
Trigger.script: captured() character.healthCurrent = tonumber(matches[2]) character.healthMaximum = tonumber(matches[3]) character.manaCurrent = tonumber(matches[4]) character.manaMaximum = tonumber(matches[5])

regexCodeList.string: Health: (\d|\d+) out of (\d+) Mana: (\d|\d+) out of (\d+)

Trigger.name: score #4
Trigger.script: captured() character.bloodlust = 0 --Need to add in having bloodlust. character.alignment = matches[2] character.alignmentPosNeg = matches[3] character.alignmentNumber = tonumber(matches[4]) if matches[3] == "-" then character.alignmentNumber = 0 - character.alignmentNumber end

regexCodeList.string: You have no blood-lust\. Your alignment is \"(\D+)\" \((\+|\-)(\d|\d+)\)\.
Your mosaic glows with (\d|\d+)\% chapter experience\. Your legend is (\d|\d+)\% complete\.
Your inventory\, held\, worn and wielded consists of (\d|\d+) items\, weighing about (\d|\d+) pounds\.
You are holding a carried weight of (\d|\d+) pounds\; there are no limits on how much you can carry.

Trigger.name: score #8
Trigger.script: captured() character.age = tonumber(matches[2]) character.birthday = matches[3] character.isBirthday = false

regexCodeList.string: You are (\d+) years old\, born on the (.*)\.
Banking: no gold available for withdrawal in any account.
Your tax bill is (\d|\d+)gp\. Earnings this month are (\d|\d+)gp\.
You are a (\D+) of Thakria \(Rank\: (\d|\d+)(th|st|nd|rd)\)\.
You do not belong to any guild.
You have no specific profession class.
You have no divine Patron.
Today marks the day of your birth!
You belong to the (\D+) Guild as an (\D+).
You have (.*) badges to your name. (\d|\d+) to go.

Trigger.name: score #17
Trigger.script: captured() character.goldHold = tonumber(matches[2]) heartbeat = tempTimer(5, send("put "..character.goldHold.." gc in backpack"))

regexCodeList.string: You are holding (\d|\d+) gold coins.
You have acquired a total of (\D+) badges. (\d|\d+) to go.
You carry (\d|\d+) gold coins. None is openly held in your hands.

Trigger.name: score #20
Trigger.script: captured() capture = matches[2] heartbeat = tempTimer(3, [[send("put "..capture.." gc in backpack")]])

regexCodeList.string: You carry (\d|\d+) gold; of which (\d|\d+) coins are openly held.
You have no divine patron.
You are a citizen of (\D+)\.

Trigger.name: status #3
Trigger.script: captured() status.bleeding = matches[2] status.breathing = matches[3] status.hunger = matches[4] status.thirst = matches[5] status.tiredness = matches[6]

regexCodeList.string: You are (not bleeding at all), (breathing perfectly well), (satiated), (not thirsty), and (feeling wide awake).
Your physical well-being is (.*)\.

Trigger.name: status #5
Trigger.script: captured() character.alignment = matches[2] character.alignmentPosNeg = matches[3] character.alignmentNumber = tonumber(matches[4]) if matches[3] == "-" then character.alignmentNumber = 0 - character.alignmentNumber end

Trigger.name: wielding #3
Trigger.script: captured() if matches[4] == right then character.wieldingRight = matches[3] elseif matches[4] == left then character.wieldingLeft = matches[3] end

regexCodeList.string: You are now wielding (a|an) (.*) in your (\D+) hand\.
You cease to wield (a|an) (.*) in your right hand.
You are wielding nothing in your right hand, and (a|an) (.*) in your left.
You are wielding (a|an) (.*) in your right hand, and nothing in your left.
You cease to wield (a|an) (.*) in your left hand.
You chant the noiseless litany of equilibrium.
You have equilibrium.
You hold NO CROWNS and have NO CROWNS invested with the banks.
You are not holding any gold coins.
You are carrying (\d|\d+) gold coins.
Your physical armour alone has a strike-reduction value of (\d|\d+)%.
Your combined armoury amounts to 45% possible strike-coverage.
You can pass safely through water breathing freely and moving normally.
You are particularly resistant to magical attack.
Your learning will be enhanced by darsurion for the whole month.
You have (.*) specific defences.
You are levitating above the ground.
You are invisible.

Trigger.name: command.describe myself
Trigger.script: send("+") send("The young man who stands before you give the impression of a walking storm. He ") send("betrays both a silent intellect and the combustion of pure chaos. While his ") send("attire is crafted from the finest of materials, his robes billow and move ") send("erratically without the wind's help. His spikey black hair contrasts against ") send("his sparkling blue eyes, which seem dart about like a tempest's lightning. ") send("+") send("His face is all sharp edges, like a broadsword that is beginning to rust, and you ") send("swear if he were to speak a veritable gale could come forth. Yet for the moment, ") send("he is quiet. He peers at you, and you realize that you have no idea what this ") send("man is thinking. His gaze lingers a moment, before moving on to see the rest ") send("of the world.")

regexCodeList.string: >>>[---------- write your text with word wrap within the brackets -----------]
(.*) opens a large tome for you.
(.*) points you towards the first page.
(.*) teaches you the rudiments of grammar.
(.*) explains the use of irony to you.
(.*) demonstrates effective reading states for you.
(.*) tries to show you the beauty of literature.
(.*) explains imagery and symbolism.
(.*) explains the ancient runic script of the alchemists.
(.*) explains magical chants and scrolls.
(.*) reminds you that practice will always improve your ability.
(.*) slams the tome shut and pronounces the lesson ended.
(.*) pulls out a large, leather-bound tome.
(.*) opens the tome and turns the pages in front of you.
(.*) chants one of the spells, demonstrating how to pronounce magic.
(.*) tells you to meditate for a moment.
You rise from meditation to see (.*) holding another tome.
(.*) opens the new tome and points to a particular section.
You repeat the incantations for (.*).
(.*) corrects you on a number of the magical words.
(.*) draws a circle in the air with an outstretched forefinger.
(.*) chants "Aiya elenya sulmino!". The circle bursts into flame.
(.*) dispels the magic, leaving you shaking.
"Come! I will train you," says (.*)
A young (.*) Guild neophyte passes you, busy about his affairs. He shoots you a significant glance.
"Do you need to be shown out of the guildhouse?"
Type YES to be led outside of the guild, or NO to see the fellow on his way.

Alias.name: delete old profiles
Alias.script:
deleteOldProfiles(matches[3], matches[2]=="maps")
--Syntax examples: "delete old profiles" -> deletes profiles older than 31 days -- "delete old maps 10" -> deletes maps older than 10 days

Alias.name: `echo
Alias.script:
local s = matches[2]
s = string.gsub(s, "%$", "
") feedTriggers("
" .. s .. "
") echo("
")

Alias.name: run lua code
Alias.script:
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: arcanium.lua
Script.script:
function captured() -- color the whole line green! selectCurrentLine() fg("SpringGreen") deselect() resetFormat() end
--Intilize Character table character = {} status = {} heartbeat = 0
